alert.note: Alert for Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 27 at 10:33AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens affecting Pasco County. .Heavy rains associated with Hurricane Ian will impact local rivers. For the Cypress Creek...including SR 54 Worthington Gardens...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The walkway to the river gage floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 7.4 feet this afternoon. It will then rise to 7.5 feet this evening. It will fall to 7.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise above flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.6 feet on 06/30/1974. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Cypress Creek SR 54 Worthington 8.0 7.5 Tue 10 am 7.4 8.7 12.5 13.8 14.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM EDT.
